settings.custom_liquid: DigestiveVM is changing to DailyBalance. New name, same formula.

settings.default_text:
Essential Vitamins & Minerals
Fill Nutrient Gaps
Amino Acids

settings.custom_liquid: Stock Selling Fast

settings.content:
If your horse is dealing with cracked hooves, poor coat condition, low energy, stressy behaviour, or you're simply trying to fill nutritional gaps in a forage-based diet - chances are their daily vitamin and mineral needs aren’t being fully met.

DailyBalance is a science-backed, vet-recommended daily supplement that provides essential vitamins, trace minerals, amino acids and a yeast-derived pre and postbiotic to support whole-horse health from the inside out, delivered in a delicious easy to feed cold pressed pellet.

settings.heading: Product Description
settings.content:
DailyBalanceis the ultimate balanced mineral and vitamin supplement for horses, formulated to ensure your horse gets all the minerals and vitamins they need to thrive.

  • Trace minerals and essential minerals
  • Vitamins including natural Vitamin E
  • Amino acids to support gut health and cell repair
  • Yeast-derived prebiotic and postbiotic for gut health support
  • Comes in palatable lucerne based pellets
  • Ideal to fill the nutrient gaps of forage (pasture or hay) based diets
  • Ideal for any horses with diets which contain less than the recommended daily rate of vitamins and minerals.

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Contains macro minerals Calcium, Phosphorous and Magnesium, trace minerals Copper, Zinc, Selenium, Manganese, Iodine and Chromium.

Ingredient list:

Lucerne Leaf Meal, Dicalcium Phosphate, Magnesium Oxide, Red Marine Algae, Threonine, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Pre & Postbiotics, Lysine, Glutamine, Vitamin and Mineral Premix with Natural Vitamin E and Organic Minerals.

settings.heading: How To Use
settings.content: In formulating DailyBalance we have been very specific with the feeding rates. How much your horse needs will vary depending on their body weight, age, and exercise workload.

settings.heading: Auto-Ship & Save
settings.content:
With Auto-Ship, you never have to worry about running out when you need it most.

You’ll receive your chosen quantity of DailyBalance at your chosen frequency.

You’ll also save 10% on the price with every single delivery and receive free shipping. Those savings add up, especially if you own multiple horses.

You can cancel or edit your Auto-Ship service at any time.

settings.text_hqT1a0vOxysx5uKS:
Even the best forage can leave nutritional gaps — and those gaps can show up in your horse’s hooves, coat, energy, and behaviour.

DailyBalance delivers daily essential vitamins and minerals to fill those nutritional gaps, to support whole-horse health, from the inside out.

settings.text_cShaSilMhNH7oKJz:
DailyBalance is a comprehensive daily supplement delivering essential vitamins, trace minerals, and amino acids to support your horse’s overall health and function.

Complete with macro and trace minerals, key vitamins like Vitamin E, amino acids, and a yeast derived pre and postbiotic blend for digestion, DailyBalance has been expertly formulated to support your horse and to fill common nutrient gaps in a delicious easy to feed pellet.

Free from sugars, grains, and molasses, DailyBalance is ideal for horses with metabolic sensitivities, on restricted diets, or in any discipline from pleasure to performance
settings.text_HtuICrO0HW8EtXWC: Lucerne is a highly digestible source of natural fibre, protein, and essential nutrients. Its rich nutrient profile provides vitamins, calcium, and plant-based proteins that support muscle tone, energy, and overall digestive function.
settings.text_YofAM9jdnHO88PIs: Dicalcium phosphate provides essential calcium and phosphorus in a balanced ratio critical for bone health, nerve function, and energy metabolism. These minerals are especially important in performance horses and growing horses to support skeletal strength and efficient cellular function.
settings.text_sI0wohClXXc2NaOc: Derived from marine algae, this natural calcium source offers high bioavailability and supports bone strength, gut pH buffering, and overall digestive health.
settings.text_mN6EN3MpgnoPQ8v5: Magnesium oxide is a bioavailable form of magnesium that plays a role in muscle relaxation, nerve health, and stress response. It also supports steady gut motility and promoting digestive comfort in horses.
settings.text_WVYoq4mHr5srN4SO: This functional fibre supports the hindgut microbiome by feeding beneficial bacteria and improving fibre fermentation. A healthy microbiome enhances nutrient absorption, stabilises manure quality, and helps build a stronger immune defence within the gut, supporting resilience under stress or dietary changes.
settings.text_id1sSQvYNpAtAetv: These essential amino acids support muscle development, topline, and tissue repair. Lysine is vital for protein synthesis, threonine for gut lining integrity, and glutamine for intestinal cell health and recovery. Together, they help maintain a robust digestive barrier and promote performance and recovery.
settings.text_qrcfrPxOKm0L6Rs0: This balanced mix delivers essential nutrients that fill common gaps in forage-based diets. With macro minerals Calcium, Phosphorous and Magnesium, trace minerals Copper, Zinc, Selenium, Manganese, Iodine and ChromiumIt, it supports everything from energy metabolism, hoof quality, and immune defense to coat shine and nervous system function, ensuring overall wellness in horses at any workload.
settings.text_MEfMBpE3d8je0ZHz: Natural Vitamin E is a potent antioxidant that protects cells from oxidative stress, especially in hard-working horses. Paired with organic (chelated) minerals like zinc and selenium, it ensures superior absorption and bioavailability, supporting immune health, muscle function, and recovery.

settings.text_o5c3ggejbUD88GAi: DailyBalance vs Regular Vitamin and Mineral Supplements

settings.text_8fagrG5tcLt8u5NO: Real and honest reviews from horse owners using DailyBalance

settings.text_hJF1rkfFRcptLk92:
DailyBalance is a comprehensive vitamin, trace mineral and amino acid supplement. It supplies nutrients known to be important for your horse’s everyday functions and health based on established daily requirements.

DailyBalance has been formulated to fill nutrient gaps of forage (pasture or hay) based diets, unfortified grain diets, or diets whereby less than the recommended feeding rate of a commercial feed is being fed.

The yeast derived pre and postbiotic supports the good bacteria in your horse’s hindgut, making fibre digestion more efficient and keeping the good bacteria happy to support overall health. It provides vitamins and minerals in their most bio-available form, including natural Vitamin E, organic selenium and organic chromium.

It does not contain grain, grain by-products or molasses, making it a good option for horses prone to laminitis, diagnosed with PPID (cushings) or PSSM and overweight horses on an energy restricted diet.
settings.text_e71NYCgWKDHAFgfZ: Why Would I Use DailyBalance Over Other Vitamin & Mineral Supplements?
settings.text_1WLjGicIcsbAUpAH:
DailyBalance is formulated to fill the nutrient gaps in most common forage and unfortified diets, meaning you’ll

only need one supplement to meet your horse’s daily nutrient requirements for trace minerals and vitamins. It

contains the additional benefit of supplying essential amino acids to build top line, strong hooves and promote gut integrity. Plus it supplies a powerful pre and postbiotic blend to support a healthy hindgut environment which promotes optimal fibre fermentation to supply your horse with a cool source of energy and production of vitamins including b-group vitamins for calm behaviour.
settings.text_Za7XRS56hD0B0CGN: What is the Difference Between DailyBalance and DigestiveEQ?
settings.text_P58ue8eF0Yq04QG8:
DigestiveEQ is designed to actively support the entire GI tract of the horse from the stomach to the hindgut, helping horses with digestive and gastro intestinal challenges. DailyBalance, on the other hand, is a complete daily vitamin and mineral supplement that fills common nutritional gaps while also supporting gut integrity, metabolic health, and performance.

While DigestiveEQ focuses on gut function and overall gut health, DailyBalance provides the daily essentials to maintain whole-horse health — and together, they have been designed to work synergistically to keep your horse thriving from the inside out
settings.text_eYUnvkuGc4RD3i62: How Long Will A 4kg Sachet Of DailyBalance Last?
settings.text_TXcevzozVR4Iz2dp:
Each 4 kg sachet will vary in the time that it lasts your horse. In formulating DigestiveVM we have been very

specific with the feeding rates for each horse and will vary depending on their body weight, age and exercise

workload. All feeding rates are clearly outlined on the label.
settings.text_UaDogQr2Lh3xN0Ju: Do I Need To Feed DailyBalance All Year?
settings.text_eRMZuMBo3c5LQ6fV:
Horses have daily requirements for nutrients and therefore it is recommended to feed DailyBalance every day for optimal health.

Even when pasture of good or excellent quality is available or new season hay is fed in adequate amounts, forage-based diets and unfortified grain diets may still be lacking in trace minerals and essential amino acids. So, while your horse may be receiving adequate energy, protein and major minerals (calcium, phosphorus, magnesium, potassium) from these unfortified diets, it is likely that nutrients like copper, zinc, selenium and iodine may be deficient within the diet. In addition, the vitamin content of hay decreases rapidly after harvesting and therefore supplying additional vitamins is essential for horses where hay is the sole forage source.
settings.text_9M55fEFpEfcTCLSF:
Yes – DailyBalance contains no grain or grain by-products or molasses making it an excellent vitamin and

mineral supplement choice for laminitic prone horses.
settings.text_YswHEUGfH4mOPRUh: How Can I Be Sure My Horses Diet Is Balanced?
settings.text_S4tazcAQ5cwLzgbC: DailyBalance is formulated to fill the nutrient gaps commonly found in many diets, including forage based (hay or pasture) diets with or without unfortified grains and to top up nutrients in situations where less than the recommended rate of a commercial feed is being fed. You can give yourself peace of mind that you’re providing your horse with balanced diet by consulting with an independent nutritionist or using a program such as FeedAssist (available on our website) or FeedXL to assess the diet for yourself.
settings.text_yUu99UHGvD3htB13: I’m Using A Feed That Has Vitamins & Minerals In It, So Can I Use DailyBalance?
settings.text_LoNUtGdVipHDsHIl: When feeding the full recommended amount of a complete feed that includes vitamins and minerals and suits your horse’s age, workload, and body weight, extra supplementation like DailyBalance may not be necessary. However, if you’re feeding less than the recommended rate, it’s likely some nutrients won’t be fully met, so adding DailyBalance can help fill any gaps. The amount needed will depend on the feed used. We recommend consulting an independent nutritionist or using a tool like FeedAssist (available on our website) to ensure your horse’s diet is balanced.
